rules: Always use type hints in Python function signatures
Read all values from config.yaml - no hardcoded measurements
Row heights must use hRule='exact' to prevent font-based expansion
Verify recto/verso page flow after any section changes
Anchor DrawingML overlays to existing paragraphs, never add new ones
Use minimized page breaks (1pt font, 1pt line spacing) before full-page tables
Stop and ask user to close files when encountering file lock errors
